main.title: We are the 1st Transport Cooperative In The Province of Romblon
main.details: issued on 18th September 2019 by the Cooperative Development Authority

about.title: ROMBLON TRANSPORT COOPERATIVE (RTC)
about.description: was formed in compliance with the PUV modernization program. RTC aims to provide quality transport services, supports the government for modernized transport system and ultimately bring about economic progress.
